name: Mini Golf 2021: Club Match Pro
description:
Up for the new golf challenge?


Let's download the free best golf game with “35+ Levels in 3 Episodes”.


Play the ultimate charm Mini Golf 2021, Realistic feel mini-golf without the overly complex game. Every age person can experience golf action games with more real and precise features than ever before. The game is very easy to play and simple to get addicted to. Start playing now and unlock a new fun sports adventure in your life.


Play The Real Sensation Of Mini Golf Game:

Mini Golf 2020 is a 3D simulation game. This adventure game offers 35+ challenging Hi-skilled levels crafted in 3 different episodes based on the intensity of challenge they have. All levels and episodes are FREE, blaze your way across the realistic mini-golf course to unlock the next level and become a world superstar. Take a swing and hit the spot to score points and get rewards. Brace yourself to get on a sports adventure and clear all levels to score points. Winning all matches is the key to become a champion.


High-quality Graphics and Surroundings:

The golf course is constructed in a lively and beautiful city on an island environment to bring colors to the game. It has realistic animations and sound effects that bring energy and passion to the game. The graphics are high quality and specially designed to get the users engaged in the game. The beautiful 3D environment will grab your attention immediately when start playing this golf game.


Smooth Touch Controls:

Intuitive touch controls will help you get through all the levels easily. On-screen UI controls are very smooth and will take you on to fun ride through the amazingly designed golf courts. The best golf game is just a click away from you. Use the touch of your fingers to be a part of a wonderful sports game.


The game has single-finger controls that can help you take your hit at the ball. Your victory depends upon the touch of your fingers, so take a fling using the UI controls. Control the direction of the ball by changing its orientation while tapping on the screen. Manage the intensity of your shot to get it into the shooting hole. Switch to landscape mode to enter a realistic world of mini-golf. This is the perfect mobile game to play where you want with your friends. Make bets with your friends on who can gain the maximum points and become a PRO golf champion. Play with 3 different episodes, all with more than 35 levels. Get ready to set a foot in the classic sports world. This game will never let you get bored and is the best substitute for your idle time. Do not miss out on this awesomely developed game, that will keep you engaged till the end.


Play on the most gorgeous golf courses against the golfers from around the world to feel like a real-time player. Win and collect rewards to unlock higher levels. Unlock new golf chapters, and be ready to customize your gameplay. To take it one step further, you can also upgrade your golf equipment to improve your swings and intensity. Take part in the matches and check the leaderboard and tournament to win awesome prizes. Show off your amazing trick shots in the multiple challenges.


Mini Golf 2020: Club Match PRO Game Features:

-Single finger or two simple controls to hit the ball.
- Directions customizer to control the directions of the ball.
- Ball shot intensity controller for shooting into the hole.
- Landscape gameplay for realistic mini-golf practice.
- 3 episodes with 35+ challenging levels to become a champion.
- Simple to play but hard to master difficulty for legitimate challenges.
- Perfect pocket mobile Mini Golf, play where you want.
- Bet and Compete with your friends and see who the pro champion.
-On-screen UI controls for specially designed to make the game easy to play
-Amazing background music and 3D graphics to give a realistic view of a golf court
-Realistic golf physics, play and win to unlock more levels
